Text.Page:
Think about it: this used to be Ger—the center of the giants' empire, right? Right.

And it's the only place you'll ever find ryten ore, right? I know.

So what if ryten ore is the secret of all this giant technology, like those living machines that are still rolling around out there? Are you still with me?

It's an opportunity to advance knowledge, and—who knows?—possibly make my name and fortune.
If I can prove the connection between ryten ore and giant technology, I'll be famous. I won't forget you, <PCNAME>!
I'll pay you for that ore as soon as you bring back enough for me to test.
